description:
What is up, humans?! ♡ Calliope Mori（森 カリオペ）here. Grim Reaper’s apprentice has a body! Can you believe it? 

I have a new PC.
And, kusotori wants to show me the wonders of "Mind Craft."
Furthermore,
letz get these diamondz tho!!!

This game is being streamed and monetized after confirming with Mojang based on the following Terms and Conditions (https://account.mojang.com/terms)

ーーーーーーーーーーーーー
REMIX EVENT ON-GOING!
REMIX MATERIALS: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/17y-OlB8SGNeBM8fi181w05vpkO8pCS4Z?usp=sharing

SoundCloud and YouTube= OK!
Email entries to deadbeatsevent@gmail.com
And, use the hashtags #deadbeatsremix and #RIPRemixEntry

Include the following description in your entry in order to be qualified.
(You MUST include it in this exact way. You may copy and paste from here!)

Original Song: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5y3xh8gs24c&ab_channel=MoriCalliopeCh.hololive-EN

Original Rap/Lyrics/Vocals by: Calliope Mori 
Twitter: @moricalliope
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCL_qhgtOy0dy1Agp8vkySQg
Original Track/ Mix by: kokorobeats a.k.a K’s/Coro
Twitter: @kokorobeats
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/kokorobeats


よろしくお願いします！みんな、一緒に楽しめると嬉しいですね。
仲良くなりたいです！日本語でも頑張る、あたしね～


[Hashtags]
(LIVE) #calliolive   #カリオライブ
(Music) #callioP
(Fanart) #callillust    #カリイラスト
(Fan-name) Dead Beats (デッドビーツ)

✿[Viewer Rules]✿
What is up, humans! Thanks for checkin’ my stream!
If you follow these rules, maybe I wait just a bit longer. :}
(Do it.)

1.Be nice to other viewers. Don’t spam or troll.
2.If you see spam or trolling, don’t respond. Just block, report, and ignore those comments.
3.Talk about the stream, but please don’t bring up unrelated topics or have personal conversations.
4.Don’t bring up other streamers or streams unless I mention them.
5.Similarly, don’t talk about me or my stream in other streamers’ chat.
6.Please refrain from chatting before the stream starts to prevent any issues.
As long as you follow the rules above, you can chat in any language.

＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝
